participant_1.background:
I came to know my family by growing up with them.
i only eat at restaurants.
i have the support of my whole family.
I'm not married, but I have a fitness tracker that helps me stay motivated and track my progress.
My first major purchase was my laptop, and I still use it every day.

participant_2.background:
I love to eat fresh produce from my family's farm, especially after a long hike.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.
I live far from my family, but I love them.
I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.
I am a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I just got back from a hike. How about you?
I'm doing great! I spent my last birthday hiking and writing a short story about it.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to hike, but I'm not much of a writer. What was your short story about?
It was about a group of survivors who were trying to find a way to escape a zombie apocalypse.
That sounds really interesting! I've always been a fan of zombie movies and TV shows.
Me too! I love the way they can make you feel so scared and anxious.
Me too! I love the feeling of being on the edge of your seat.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to cook and bake. I also love to go shopping.
I love to cook too! I love trying new recipes and experimenting with different flavors.
Me too! I love to find new ways to use different ingredients.
I love that feeling of creating something delicious and unique.
Me too! It's so rewarding to see people enjoy the food you've made.
I know, right? It's the best feeling in the world
